faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I convert large CSV files to Excel?
faq.a1: Yes! Our tool handles CSV files of various sizes. For very large files (100MB+), the conversion may take a bit longer, but the process is optimized for performance.
faq.q2: Will formatting be preserved during conversion?
faq.a2: CSV files contain only raw data without formatting. The Excel file will have the data properly organized in cells, but you'll need to apply formatting (colors, fonts, borders) manually in Excel after conversion.

content.p1: Our free CSV to XML converter transforms comma-separated values (CSV) data into well-structured XML format. Perfect for data migration, system integration, API development, and converting spreadsheet data into XML for enterprise applications, web services, and legacy systems.
content.what_title: üîç What is CSV to XML Conversion?
content.what_desc: CSV to XML conversion transforms tabular data from comma-separated values format into eXtensible Markup Language. While CSV is simple and widely used for spreadsheets and data exports, XML provides better structure, metadata support, and is required by many enterprise systems, SOAP APIs, and data interchange standards.

content.how_title: üìù How to Convert CSV to XML

1.title: Click Convert
1.desc: Press "Convert to XML" to transform your CSV into structured XML format.

2.title: Copy and Use
2.desc: The XML output appears on the right. Click "Copy" to use it in your application.

3.title: Download XML File
3.desc: Click the download button to save your converted XML file, ready to use in applications, APIs, or data exchange systems.

faq.q1: How does the converter handle CSV headers?
faq.a1: The first row of your environment CSV is automatically used as XML element names. Make sure your CSV has descriptive headers for best results.
faq.a2: Yes! All conversion happens in your browser using JavaScript. Your CSV data never leaves your device or gets sent to any server.
faq.q3: Can I convert large CSV files?
faq.a3: Yes, you can convert CSV files of any size. Very large files may take a few seconds to process depending on your device.
faq.q4: What if my CSV has commas in the data?
faq.a4: For CSV data with commas, ensure values are properly quoted. Our converter handles standard CSV formatting including quoted fields.
faq.q5: Can I use this for Excel data?
faq.a5: Absolutely! Export your Excel data as CSV, then use this tool to convert it to XML format.

tips_list.1: Clean your data: Remove extra spaces and special characters from headers before conversion.
tips_list.2: Test with examples: Use the "Example" button to understand the conversion format.
tips_list.3: Validate XML output: Always validate the generated XML against your target system's requirements.
tips_list.4: Handle special characters: Special characters are automatically escaped for valid XML output.
tips_list.5: Validate your XML output using an XML validator to ensure proper structure and compatibility with your target system.

content.hero_description: Convert Excel files to CSV format for compatibility with databases, data analysis tools, and programming languages.
content.feature1_desc: Converts all sheets from your Excel file into separate CSV files.
content.feature2_desc: Preserves all cell values while converting to plain text format.
content.feature3_desc: Quick conversion with immediate download of CSV files.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Will formulas be converted to CSV?
faq.a1: CSV format only supports plain text values. When converting Excel to CSV, formulas will be replaced with their calculated values. If you need to preserve formulas, keep a copy of the original Excel file.
faq.q2: Can I convert multiple Excel sheets at once?
faq.a2: Each Excel worksheet needs to be converted separately to CSV. If your Excel file has multiple sheets, you'll get a separate CSV file for each sheet, or you can choose which sheet to convert.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Do I need to download from Google Sheets first?
faq.a1: Yes, you'll need to download your Google Sheet as an Excel file (.xlsx) or CSV first. In Google Sheets, go to File > Download > Microsoft Excel (.xlsx) to get the file for conversion.
faq.q2: Will Google Sheets formulas work in Excel?
faq.a2: Most common formulas (SUM, AVERAGE, IF, VLOOKUP) are compatible between Google Sheets and Excel. However, some Google-specific functions may not work in Excel and will need to be adjusted.

content.p1: Our free TSV to CSV converter transforms Tab-Separated Values files into Comma-Separated Values format. Perfect for converting data exports, database dumps, and spreadsheet files from TSV to CSV for use in Excel, Google Sheets, and data analysis tools.
content.what_title: What is TSV to CSV Conversion?
content.what_desc: TSV to CSV conversion transforms data from Tab-Separated Values format (where columns are separated by tabs) to Comma-Separated Values format (where columns are separated by commas). CSV is more widely supported by spreadsheet applications and data tools, making it the preferred format for data exchange.

faq.q1: What's the difference between TSV and CSV?
faq.a1: TSV uses tabs to separate columns while CSV uses commas. CSV is more widely supported by spreadsheet applications and data tools.
faq.a2: Yes! All conversion happens in your browser using JavaScript. Your TSV data never leaves your device.

meta.title: XLS to XLSX Converter - Free Online Excel Upgrade
meta.description: Convert old XLS files to modern XLSX format online. Free tool to upgrade legacy Excel files.
meta.subtitle: Upgrade legacy XLS files to modern XLSX format effortlessly

form.title: Convert XLS to XLSX
form.subtitle: Upgrade your Excel files to modern format
form.upload_label: Click to upload or drag and drop

content.hero_description: Upgrade legacy Excel 97-2003 (XLS) files to the modern XLSX format for better compatibility and features.
content.feature1_desc: XLSX files are smaller due to ZIP compression technology.
content.feature2_desc: XLSX supports 1 million+ rows vs XLS's 65,536 row limit.
content.feature3_desc: XLSX format has better security and corruption recovery.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What is the difference between XLS and XLSX?
faq.a1: XLS is the older Excel format (Excel 97-2003) with a 65,536 row limit. XLSX is the modern XML-based format (Excel 2007+) with 1,048,576 rows, better compression, and improved security. Converting to XLSX is recommended for better compatibility.
faq.q2: Will macros be preserved when converting XLS to XLSX?
faq.a2: Yes, macros and VBA code are preserved during conversion. However, if your file contains macros, save it as .XLSM (macro-enabled) instead of .XLSX to ensure macros remain functional.

meta.title: XLSX to XLS Converter - Free Online Excel Downgrade

form.title: Convert XLSX to XLS
form.subtitle: Create files compatible with older Excel versions
form.upload_label: Click to upload or drag and drop

content.hero_description: Convert modern Excel files (XLSX) to legacy format (XLS) for compatibility with Excel 97-2003 and older systems.
content.feature1_desc: Ensures your files work on older computers and Excel versions.
content.feature2_desc: Maintains your data while converting to older format.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why would I convert XLSX back to XLS?
faq.a1: Converting to XLS format is useful for compatibility with older Excel versions (Excel 97-2003) or legacy systems that don't support the newer XLSX format. However, XLS has limitations like fewer rows and larger file sizes.
faq.q2: Will I lose data when converting XLSX to XLS?
faq.a2: If your XLSX file has more than 65,536 rows or 256 columns, data will be truncated when converting to XLS format. Also, some newer Excel features may not be supported in the older XLS format.
